propList.Name: actions
propList.Description: List of action items rendered below the comment content

propList.Name: author
propList.Description: The element to display as the comment author

propList.Name: avatar
propList.Description: The element to display as the comment avatar - generally an antd Avatar or src

propList.Name: children
propList.Description: Nested comments should be provided as children of the Comment

propList.Name: content
propList.Description: The main content of the comment

propList.Name: datetime
propList.Description: A datetime element containing the time to be displayed
